resources.string:
We take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting the personal information you share with our app. This application collects certain personal information to provide its services, including your email address, password, phone number, full name, and date of birth. These details are necessary to create and manage your account, verify your identity, and ensure the security of your data.
All information you provide is stored securely on your device using local storage mechanisms (SharedPreferences) and is not transmitted to any external servers or shared with third parties. Your data is used solely for authentication, account management, and improving your experience within the app.
We do not collect additional personal information, such as location data, contacts, or usage behavior. Your information will never be sold, rented, or exchanged with other companies for marketing purposes.
We take reasonable measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or modification. However, no method of storage or transmission over the internet is completely secure, and by using this app, you acknowledge these inherent risks.
Users have the right to review, update, or delete their personal information stored within the app at any time. We encourage you to keep your data accurate and up-to-date to ensure the best possible experience.
This privacy policy may be updated from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We recommend reviewing it periodically to stay informed about how your information is protected.
By using this application, you consent to the collection, use, and storage of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy.
